eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\pi_{2m}(\lambda)   &=& \mbox{e}^{N\lambda^2}(-1)^m 2N\sqrt{\lambda}\int_0^\infty ds\
  \mbox{e}^{-Ns^2} s^{2m+\frac12} J_{-\frac12}(2Ns\lambda) \nonumber\\
\pi_{2m+1}(\lambda) &=&  \mbox{e}^{N\lambda^2}(-1)^m 2N\sqrt{\lambda}\int_0^\infty ds\
\mbox{e}^{-Ns^2} s^{2m+\frac32} J_{+\frac12}(2Ns\lambda) \ ,
\label{OPrepherm}
\
